duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for overall management of assigned projects, including field coordination, surveyors, and technicians.
Manage day-to-day operations, proposals/estimates, workload distribution, and invoicing.
Work closely with project team to transition projects seamlessly from one phase to the next.
Perform all duties and responsibilities of a field surveyor.
Maintain clear and timely communications, professionalism, and morale throughout the internal and external project team.
Provide leadership to staff and project team members, establish clear performance standards, and motivate team members.
Contribute to financial growth through cost-effective operations of projects.
Allocate manpower and resources for timely and budget-compliant project completion.
Facilitate the development of technical, management, and communication skills for project team.
Prepare and review proposals, contracts, and project schedules for maximum profitability.
Maintain client relationships and aid in the development of prospective clients in the geographic market.
Enhance the corporate image through active participation in appropriate organizations and significant client contact.
Maintain a working knowledge of AutoCAD, word processing, and spreadsheet programs.
Contribute to overall team efforts by completing other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: Professional land surveyor's license or equivalent project management experience.
